title: I got leaver buster for a game i didn't leave.
body: I was loading in to the game when all of a sudden i got a black screen, so i simply closed it out back to the reconnect screen and it kept repeating this process unfairly. I've had numerous unlucky crashes which cause the game to believe im leaving every one of these games and i sincerely hope i don't eventually get banned for it. This all started with the new client and i've never had these issues before. I want to keep playing, but i don't want to keep crashing and build up higher penalties. I have lowest game quality, but it doesn't seem to help.

replies.body:
That really sucks that you got hit with a penalty just because you weren't able to load into the match in time. If you're absent from the match for a certain amount of time, the system will flag it as a "leave" since your team is having to play with only 4 members. 

It sounds like your network was having a hard time getting a solid connection to our servers when you start to load into the match. We should be able to smooth that out by going over some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), but hit me back up if that doesn't seem to help. I definitely don't want you to get penalized anymore, so let's make sure to test these changes in custom or practice games!
